Title: Hatted Hibernation
Description:
I'll let you in on a secret, these crates? They're prank supplies! 

People are so serious around here. What's better than a little prank to lift everyone's spirits?

You could put some of these fun hats on some of the sleeping druids because what's more fun than a surprise hat?

Be careful though, their connection to the dream could make anything happen!
ObjectivesText: Put 6 silly hats on Dreaming Druids.

Objectives.Text: Silly Hats placed on Dreaming Druids
